description_en: Welcome to Toki Pona Day!
description_tok: o kama pona tawa suno pi toki pona!

description_en: showing some new toki pona songs of mine!
description_tok: mi pana e kalama musi sin pi toki pona!

title_en: Let's crimp wire connector onto wires!
title_tok: o pana e lawa tawa linja wawa!
description_en:
Demonstration on how to crimp XH wire connector onto wires.
In the video, it shows LED, buzzer, etc. being powered via the connector.
description_tok:
o lukin! mi pana e lawa pi linja wawa “XH” tawa linja wawa.
kepeken lawa ni la mi ken pana e wawa tawa ilo suno tawa ilo kalama tawa ilo ante.

description_en: o sitelen musi, o pana e sitelen! o sona e kon sitelen, o pana e ona! jan li ni lon sike la musi a.
description_tok: o sitelen musi, o pana e sitelen! o sona e kon sitelen, o pana e ona! jan li ni lon sike la musi a.

title_en: the best way to count.. in toki pona!

description_en: Acoustic guitar version of my previously released song “weka ike”

title_tok: toki pona la nimi la nasin kalama

title_en: Blood on The Clocktower in toki pona
description_en: BoTC is a social deduction and deception game, a mafia-like that is. the main distinguishing features of the game are that death is not the end and private discussions are allowed and encouraged
description_tok: musi BoTC la ike li kama lon kulupu suli! sina lon kulupu pona la sina o alasa sona e ike, kulupu o moli e ike. sina ike la sina o moli e ale o len e ni: sina seme lon kulupu. musi ni li sama lili musi Mapo la tenpo pimeja en tenpo suno li lon. tenpo suno la ale li ken toki li ken alasa sona e ijo kulupu. tenpo pimeja la ale li kepeken wawa ona. ike li moli e jan li jaki e wawa ona, pona li alasa e ike li awen e lon kulupu.

title_en: ilo Muni pi mute nimi - toki pona Ngrams
description_en: how often are specific words and phrases used in toki pona? how has usage changed over time? this new tool can show you
description_tok: nimi en kulupu nimi li mute seme lon toki pona? nasin li ante ala ante lon tenpo? ilo sin ni li pana e sona ni
